analysis.description:
PoCGame.payout (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#182-189) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#187)

PoCGame.loseWager (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#206-213) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#210)

PoCGame.play (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#138-166) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#194-201):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#198)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#199)

Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#206-213):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#210)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#211)

Detected issues with version pragma in /data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#7): it allows old versions
PoCGame.randomSeed (/data/0x7d09edb07d23acb532a82be3da5c17d9d85806b4.sol#57) is never used in PoCGame
